```{r}
#| label: setup
#| include: false

library(tidyverse)
theme_set(theme_light())
library(brms)
```

```{r}
#| label: mald

mald <- readRDS("data/tucker2019/mald_1_1.rds")
```

```{r}
#| label: rt-logn

rt_logn <- brm(
  RT ~ 1,
  family = lognormal,
  data = mald,
  cores = 4,
  seed = 1032,
  file = "data/cache/rt_logn"
)
```

```{r}
#| label: fig-rt-logn-pp
pp_check(rt_logn, ndraws = 20)
```

```{r}
#| label: rt-phonlev

rt_phonlev <- brm(
  RT ~ 1 + PhonLev,
  family = lognormal,
  data = mald,
  cores = 4,
  seed = 1032,
  file = "data/cache/rt_phonlev"
)
```

```{r}
#| label: rt-phonlev-summary

summary(rt_phonlev)
```

```{r}
#| label: fig-rt-phonlevl-cond

conditional_effects(rt_phonlev)
```
